# NETWORK::SET_NETWORK_ID_VISIBLE_IN_CUTSCENE_REMAIN_HACK

## Summary
Keeps the local visibility flag (set by SET_NETWORK_ID_VISIBLE_IN_CUTSCENE) remain set after the cutscene has ended

## Parameters
* **NETWORK_INDEX** networkId
* **BOOL** set
